episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #155: Negativity
episodes.summary:
On this episode, I would like to bring your awareness to your “hidden” negativity, beyond the obvious awareness level, and I want you to notice it in other people as you communicate with them. The reason why I want you to be aware of it is because it has a huge impact on the results you are getting in your lives. This “innocent” negativity ends up costing you your relationships, lost time and money.

Join me as we explore the best ways to find hidden negativity in your life and turn it into something that serves you and brings you positive results.

Get full show notes and more information here: https://thelifecoachschool.com/155

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #154: Apathy
episodes.summary:
Join me as we pull back the curtain on the epidemic of apathy that is leading so many people nowhere in their lives. Discover the best course of action to reignite your drive and embark on the most rewarding journey of our life!

Get full show notes, transcripts, and more information here: https://thelifecoachschool.com/154

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #153: Hope is a Problem
episodes.summary:
Many of my clients believe that hope is a positive emotion and a concept. However, the way they think about hope and use it in their lives actually hurts them.

Hope is deceptive.

Hope doesn’t inspire action.

Being hopeful comes from the place of lack and scarcity.

For most people, hope causes them to wait for things to happen to them rather than going out and creating those things for themselves.

Tune to this week’s episode for a healthy dose of motivation and inspiration to take your life into your own hands and create the life that you want to live.

After listening to this episode, I hope,  that you stop hoping and "go get it"!

Get full show notes, transcripts, and more information here: https://thelifecoachschool.com/153

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #152: Fear
episodes.summary:
On this episode of The Life Coach School podcast, we’re talking about an emotion that is responsible for most of what we don’t do in our lives – fear.

 

Join me this week to gain a better understanding of fear and discover the best ways to build courage for taking action toward the evolution to a better you. You won’t want to miss this episode’s tools that will help you release your suffering that fear brings.

Get full show notes and more information here: https://thelifecoachschool.com/152

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #151: Self-Pity
episodes.summary:
In this particular episode, we’re talking about something that most of us have experienced, probably more than once in our lives – self-pity.

Self-pity is one of the most detrimental emotions that robs so many of us of taking action, as well as our accomplishments. Sadly, most of the time, we don’t even know that we’re indulging in this self-indulgent and useless emotion.

Join us this week to discover how you can dramatically improve your life by kicking the habit of feeling sorry for yourself and how you can get started on that much-needed journey.

Get full show notes and more information here: https://thelifecoachschool.com/151

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Bonus Training - February 2016
episodes.summary:
Welcome to this special Bonus Training!

The reason why I did this Bonus Training call is because I wanted to demonstrate what it’s like to work with me and be coached by me on a live call.

This is the last time that I’m offering any free coaching because I’m going to reserve all of my future coaching calls for inside of my Self Coaching Scholars course.

I want to encourage those of you who want to coach or be coached and want to apply everything that I’m teaching you on the podcast to join me inside the Self Coaching Scholars.

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #150: Lessons Learned - The Proposal
episodes.summary:
Not too long ago, I received an email from one of my listeners, Jake, telling me about how he and his girlfriend, Whitney, listen to the podcast together and apply everything that they’ve learned. He shared how they were falling in love and developing their relationship while listening to this show and discussing it together.

I think so many of us in our relationships don’t talk about deep subjects – what it’s like to feel our emotions and what’s really going on in our minds. And I think it’s absolutely beautiful and rare to find a couple like Jake and Whitney.

In his email, Jake said he wanted to propose to Whitney and asked for my help. Of course, I agreed right away.

So this episode is the result of our plan to help Jake propose.

Get full show notes and more information here: https://thelifecoachschool.com/150

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #149: Confidence as a Byproduct
episodes.summary:
On this fourth and final episode of our mini-series of resilience, we dig into exactly how people become confident and the role adversity plays in this process.

Join me this week for some important actionable advice that will surely help you get to the end goal of any of your commitments.

Get full show notes and more information here: https://thelifecoachschool.com/149

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #148: Mind over Matter
episodes.summary:
On this third part of our four-part series on the topic of resilience, we take a look at the types of beliefs that support perseverance and keep us from giving up on our goals. Join us to find out what makes us stay true to our commitment and discover the questions that will help keep you moving toward your goal until you reach your desired results.

Get full show notes and more information here: https://thelifecoachschool.com/148

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #147: How Quitting Slows You Down
episodes.summary:
On this second part of our conversation about resilience, we’re talking about the habit of quitting something that you’ve previously committed to and how that becomes a dangerous learned skill. We get into the thoughts and feelings involved in the process of quitting and how many of us justify giving up on our commitments.

Don’t miss this episode’s actionable steps that you can start using today to remove quitting as an option from your daily life and achieve your goals!

Get full show notes and more information here: https://thelifecoachschool.com/147

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #146: Compelling Reason
episodes.summary:
Today, we delve into the topic of commitment and what it takes to make it so solid that your success is inevitable. Listen in to discover what commitment and telling yourself “no” can do for your success and how a compelling reason can help you gather all the strength you need on the way to your commitment.

Get full show notes and more information here: https://thelifecoachschool.com/146

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #145: When You've Been Let Down
episodes.summary:
On this episode, I pull back the curtain on why so many of us stick to our guns (so we can always be “right”), instead of being able to have adult discussions about what really is going on when we feel let down.

Join me as I explain how we can create forward movement and continue our evolution into a better version of ourselves when these things happen, as well as how we can make light of these awkward happenings and stay in the place where we can find our own shortcomings.

Get full show notes and more information here: https://thelifecoachschool.com/145

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #144: Forgiveness
episodes.summary:
On this episode of The Life Coach School, I’m pulling back the curtain on what it really means to forgive someone and stop punishing yourself with endless agony. Listen in to find out how you can finally free yourself from the bondage of anger and resentment, and change your life forever.

Get full show notes and more information here: https://thelifecoachschool.com/144

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #143: Anger
episodes.summary:
When we’re angry and upset, we are so attached to our own thinking and justifying our anger that we can’t see past it. It seems almost impossible to get out of that loop even if we consciously understand that it causes us pain and agony.

So how do we break free of the heavy weight of anger and even use it to for good?

Get full show notes and more information here: https://thelifecoachschool.com/143

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #142: Questions and Answers
episodes.summary:
This week, we cover a lot of ground and cover topics like dealing with the feeling about the election results, the power of studying yourself, buffering, relationship management, and details about our new Self Coaching Scholars program.

Get full show notes and more information here: https://thelifecoachschool.com/142

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #141: Study Yourself
episodes.summary:
In this episode, I would like to fill in that gap between the knowledge of self-help topics that many of us have and the practice that’s required to apply it to achieve the end product of the life that we ultimately want.

Tune into this episode to find out how you can begin this much-needed journey of studying yourself.

Get full show notes and more information here: https://thelifecoachschool.com/141

Also, learn more about our Self Coaching Scholars program here

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #140: Lessons Learned from Napoleon Hill
episodes.summary:
Today, we’re taking a look at the work of Napoleon Hill, an American author of personal-success literature who has written one of the greatest success books of all times – Think and Grow Rich.

Tune into this week’s show as we take a deep dive into Napoleon’s Think and Grow Rich by looking at some of the best ideas and quotes from the book and discuss those concepts in detail.

This introduction to Napoleon Hill’s work is full of incredible wisdom on the topics of success and achievement and is sure to help you take full possession of your mind.

Get full show notes and more information here: https://thelifecoachschool.com/140

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #139: Someone to Love
episodes.summary:
On this episode of The Life Coach School, we’re taking a deep dive into relationships.  We cover how you can use life coaching tools like The Model, Emotional Adulthood, and The Manual to improve your relationships and enjoy them to best of your ability.

Get full show notes and more information here: https://thelifecoachschool.com/139

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #138: Feeling On Purpose
episodes.summary:
On this episode of The Life Coach School Podcast, we’re talking about learning to feel all of our emotions on purpose and being able to manage them. Join us for an in-depth step-by-step guide on how you can learn to feel on purpose, live the life you deserve, and create anything you want in your life.

Get full show notes and more information here: https://thelifecoachschool.com/138

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Spread the Love!
episodes.summary:
This week, I asked my podcast editor at Authority Engine to help walk you through the process of leaving an iTunes review on Mac and PC, your iPhone, or if you only have internet access on your Android device, leaving a review on Stitcher.

iPhone - [8:32]

Get full show notes and more information here: https://thelifecoachschool.com/review

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #137: The Case for Pain
episodes.summary:
In this episode, I make a case for pain: why you can’t afford to not embrace the pain of being human and why you must strive to move toward the pain and away from pleasure to live a fulfilling life.

Get full show notes and more information here: https://thelifecoachschool.com/137

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #136: Thought Loops
episodes.summary:
One of the things that I’ve been working on recently is the concept of what I call “thought loops.” Essentially, a thought loop is a thought error that tends to happen in our brain and is reminiscent of the Obsessive Compulsive Disorder but is something that we can easily control.

In this episode, we take a deep dive into what these errors are, how they present themselves in our lives, and how we can overcome them. I als0 explain how these compulsive and irrational thought loops have shown up (and are still showing up) in my life.

Get full show notes and more information here: https://thelifecoachschool.com/136

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #135: Why Growing Matters
episodes.summary:
In this important episode, we take a look at the benefits of self-growth and how it can increase our capacity for well-being. We explore Maslow's theory of self-actualization and how ignoring our desire for making a contribution to the consciousness of the planet can hurt or even kill us.

Listen in to find out how you can begin facilitating true self-growth that will come from an internal place and evolve you in a cognitive and emotional way.

Get full show notes and more information here: https://thelifecoachschool.com/135

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #134: Hedonism
episodes.summary:
On this episode, we continue our exploration of the pursuit of well-being and how constantly seeking false pleasures prevents us from achieving it. I explain the importance of delaying gratification and how it can lead to tremendous personal growth and increased effort threshold.

Listen in to discover the steps that you need to take to achieve your ultimate level of well-being and to make sure that your pursuit of “the prize” is filled with joy, exhilaration, and anticipation.

Get full show notes and more information here: https://thelifecoachschool.com/134

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #133: Well-Being vs Pleasure
episodes.summary:
This week we explore the difference between cultivating well-being and constantly living in the realm of false pleasures, and how understanding that distinction can help you find your path to an authentic life that humans were born to lead.

Get full show notes and more information here: https://thelifecoachschool.com/133

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #132: Stop Buffering
episodes.summary:
What are we to do in our society of easily obtainable pleasure in order to live a truly authentic and fulfilling life?

Join us on this episode and we dig into this idea of buffering and how we can stop using external things to change how we feel emotionally.

Get full show notes and more information here: https://thelifecoachschool.com/132/

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #131: Weight Loss and Overeating Tools Part 2
episodes.summary:
Tune in as I explain the role our hormones play in our ability to lose weight and how sugar and flour affect them. I also cover how dopamine and neurotransmitters affect our desire for food and what we can do in order to get that desire under control, as well as many other concepts that I will be covering in our upcoming training.

If you’re someone who would like to take control of their weight or a coach who would like to help their clients do the same, you won’t want to miss this episode or our STOP OVEREATING WORKSHOP LIVE on October 17th and 18th.

Get full show notes and more information here: https://thelifecoachschool.com/131

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #130: Lessons from Jack Canfield
episodes.summary:
For our 130th episode, we have another "Lessons from" episode where I share one of my teachers who had a great impact on my life and the teachings of my own. And today, we’re looking into the teachings of Jack Canfield, particularly the ideas laid out in his book, The Success Principles: How to Get from Where You Are to Where You Want to Be.

Get full show notes and more information here: https://thelifecoachschool.com/130

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #129: Weight Loss and Overeating Tools Part 1
episodes.summary:
In the first part of our this series, I’m talking about some of the main tools laid out in my book, If I'm So Smart, Why Can't I Lose Weight?, as well some of the updates and improvements I’ve made to them over the years.

Get full show notes and more information here: https://thelifecoachschool.com/129

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #128: Minimalism
episodes.summary:
In this episode, I share my thoughts on minimalism and how I apply them to my house, to my work, and to my eating habits. I share my best tips for getting rid of non-essential “stuff” that weighs us down and prevents us from experiencing true freedom.

Get full show notes and more information here: https://thelifecoachschool.com/128/

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #127: Appropriate Discomfort
episodes.summary:
On this episode, we’re digging into the topic of us being inappropriately comfortable in our current society and how appropriate discomfort can help us grow as human beings.

Join us we go through the best quotes from Tears to Triumph and uncover how we can beat this epidemic of our media-driven society that wants to dull our emotional pain and appropriate discomfort that drives our growth.

Get full show notes and more information here: https://thelifecoachschool.com/127

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #126: The Power of Planning
episodes.summary:
Join us as I break down how planning can set you free and help you eliminate the burnout and energy drain that comes with indecision. You won’t want to miss this explanation of how being deliberate about how you spend your time can help you achieve true freedom in your life and business. 

Get full show notes and more information here: https://thelifecoachschool.com/126

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #125: Acceptance vs Giving Up
episodes.summary:
On this episode, I explain how you can tell the difference between backing out of something and accepting the reality and why this distinction is so important for us to understand. Listen in to find out how you can use acceptance to your advantage and (hopefully) get inspired to finish those important tasks you've put behind you and live a more fulfilled life!

Get full show notes and more information here: https://thelifecoachschool.com/125

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #124: Life Coaching Advanced Skills
episodes.summary:
In the last episode, we covered all of the basic tools we teach at The Life Coach School. Today, we’re going way deeper and take a look at the advanced skills that our students learn.

Get full show notes and more information here: https://thelifecoachschool.com/124

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #123: Life Coaching Tools Review
episodes.summary:
On this episode, I introduce and talk about the tools that we use at The Life Coach School. When you learn these tools and start applying them, your life will inevitably change and  you will be able to obtain increased awareness and empowerment.

No matter if you’re a coach and you’ve been with The Life Coach School since episode 1 (this will be a great review for you) or if you haven’t been introduced to our tools yet, you won’t want to miss this episode!

Get full show notes and more information here: https://thelifecoachschool.com/123

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #122: Questions and Answers
episodes.summary:
Welcome to another Questions and Answers episode, where I answer questions on a variety of topics that you asked in the comments of past episode posts.

This week, we dig into the reason why not all people who have issues with alcohol need to label themselves as alcoholics  and why we should keep an open mind on the subject matter. We also cover topics like hiring a new coach, dealing with social anxiety, managing your thoughts to live a life of abundance and much more.

Get full show notes and more information here: https://thelifecoachschool.com/122

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #121: Friday Coach Like
episodes.summary:
On this episode, I’m reading some of the pieces that I have written over the past year in my Friday Coach Like weekly emails. Don’t miss this opportunity to hear some of the important insights that I’ve gained that helped me become a better coach and a better person.

Get full show notes and more information here: https://thelifecoachschool.com/121

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #120: Lessons Learned from Tom Sterner
episodes.summary:
This week, we have another "Lessons Learned" episode; this time, from the founder and CEO of The Practicing Mind Institute, Tom Sterner. Tom is an absolute pro when it comes to figuring and teaching out the power of practice and how learning to love the process of practicing can help you achieve excellence in any area of your life.

Get full show notes and more information here: https://thelifecoachschool.com/120

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #119: Emotional Manipulation
episodes.summary:
On this episode, we pull back the curtain on why so many of us believe that others have the ability to manipulate how we feel, think, and even act. We look at the different ways that people try to “control” others and how you can guide yourself from those situations and people.

Get full show notes and more information here: https://thelifecoachschool.com/119

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #118: Stop Overdrinking Part 3
episodes.summary:
On this episode, we’re talking about the tools for unlearning the desire to drink that's causing us so much trouble. Join us as I share the tools that I use with my clients to achieve that seemingly impossible feat.

Get full show notes and more information here: https://thelifecoachschool.com/118

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #117: Stop Overdrinking Part 2
episodes.summary:
Last week we talked about why like alcohol and how it affects our brain, as well as the role desire plays in that process. In this second part of our three-part series on how to stop overdrinking we’re diving into the reasons why some of us want to cut back our drinking and why it’s so challenging one the desire is programmed into our subconscious.

Get full show notes and more information here: https://thelifecoachschool.com/117/

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #116: Stop Overdrinking Part 1
episodes.summary:
In this first part of the 3-part mini-series on how to stop overdrinking, I’m sharing my back story and why I decided to put this resource together for you. Then, we move into why we drink, why we like alcohol, why we have it in our lives, why it’s important to us, and how it affects our brain. If you’re looking to either cut back on your alcohol consumption or lose your desire to drink altogether, this episode is for you!

Get full show notes and more information here: https://thelifecoachschool.com/116/

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #115: Generosity
episodes.summary:
This week, we’re taking a deep dive into what true generosity is all about and why so many people get it wrong.  Joins us as I explain exactly how you can give freely (whether it’s money, knowledge, or time) without ever feeling resentful, and reap the immense benefits of that deeply fulfilling process.

Get full show notes and more information here: https://thelifecoachschool.com/115/

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #114: Creating Confidence
episodes.summary:
On this episode of Life Coach School, we take a deep dive into the ways we can learn to overcome our primitive brain and begin creating higher-level contributions to the world. Listen in as I give you a bit of a different spin on confidence and share how I create confidence for myself  and how I help my students do the same.

Get full show notes and more information here: https://thelifecoachschool.com/114

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #113: Creating Passion
episodes.summary:
In this episode of The Life Coach School, we delve into how we can create passion for ourselves. We take a look at what passion is and where it comes from, and why no external factors can create it for us. Turn up your volume and listen in for my proven step-by-step process that you can start using today to generate passion in your business, relationships, and life.

Get full show notes and more information here: https://thelifecoachschool.com/113

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #112: Post-Traumatic Growth
episodes.summary:
Join us for an exploration of the incredible possibilities that can open up for those  willing to do the work and become the hero of their story. Discover how you can set off on your post-traumatic journey and develop a deeper relationship with yourself and become a new, better, and stronger version of yourself.

Get full show notes and more information here: https://thelifecoachschool.com/112

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #111: Making Money
episodes.summary:
On this episode, we cover the topic of making money, as well as the importance of adopting a new mindset conducive to increasing your earnings. Tune in as I share my personal story and background that helped me f0rm my abundance mindset and explain how you too can exceed what you thought was “normal” for you in terms of how much you can earn.

Get full show notes and more information here: https://thelifecoachschool.com/111

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #110: Lessons Learned from Joe Dispenza
episodes.summary:
Tune in to hear some of Joe Dispenza's mind-blowing ideas and concepts that I discovered while going through his body of work. 

Get full show notes and more information here: http://thelifecoachschool.com/110

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #109: Pre-Frontal Power
episodes.summary:
Today, we’re talking about the most evolved part of us, as humans, and what separates us from animals – the prefrontal cortex. It is the part of our brain responsible for personality expression, decision making, moderating social behavior, and executive function. The prefrontal cortex is what allows us to think about thinking, and that’s what we’re focusing on today.

Get full show notes and more information here: http://thelifecoachschool.com/109/

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #108: Gratitude Ahead of Time
episodes.summary:
Join us as I explain the immense benefits of gratitude ahead of time and lay out a step-by-step process that you can start using today to create whatever you desire in your life.

I can’t express how excited I am to share this information with you. If you practice this process on a regular basis, I am confident that you’ll be able to have all of the answers before you actually need them. That will allow you to eliminate worry, access a whole another level of wisdom, and preemptively get rid of all of the obstacles you might have on the way to your dreams and desires.

Get full show notes and more information here: http://thelifecoachschool.com/108

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #107: When Something Sucks
episodes.summary:
Regardless of the reason why you feel the way that you do, I would like to offer a solution that you could regularly come back to if you happen to get sucker punched or something seems to really suck in your life. Listen in for my step-by-step process to help get you out of that feeling that everything is so horrible.

Don’t miss this opportunity to find out how you can actively do something instead of feeling powerless and grow as a human being, using those terrible events to make your life better!

Get full show notes and more information here: http://thelifecoachschool.com/107

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #106: Knowing vs Not Knowing
episodes.summary:
On this episode of The Life Coach School podcast, we take a look what it means, as well as what it feels like, to truly know something. We also break down what we can do in order make the process of looking into the unknown easier. Join us to discover how you can stop living in the place of confusion and move towards more knowing and more willingness to go into the unknown, letting go of the “I don’t know” excuse we have all been guilty of.

Get full show notes and more information here: http://thelifecoachschool.com/106

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #105: Weight Loss - Desire
episodes.summary:
On this episode of The Life Coach School, we take a deep dive into the reasons why certain people have a stronger desire to eat way too much and look at wat we can do to better control it. Listen in to this in-depth exploration of desire to overeat (and overindulge in just about anything) and discover the strategies for eliminating it. 

Get full show notes and more information here: http://thelifecoachschool.com/105

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #104: Weight Loss - Discomfort
episodes.summary:
Join us as we dig into the logic behind wanting to avoid discomfort and why it will not serve you in losing weight and keeping it off.  Tune in to discover how you can build a better relationship with yourself and dissolve the need for escape through overeating. I also wrap up the episode with the 10 things you must know to help you stop overeating.

Get full show notes and more information here: http://thelifecoachschool.com/104

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #103: The Process of Change
episodes.summary:
Listen in as I explain why making changes in our lives is so difficult for most of us and lay out the step-by-step process that you can use to transition from the old models to new ones. We also get into how to bridge the gap between the two models and what it takes to make the new model unconscious. Don’t miss this important episode on making the process of change easier and creating your life deliberately.

Get full show notes and more information here: http://thelifecoachschool.com/103

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #102: What Do You Want To Create?
episodes.summary:
In this episode of The Life Coach School, we dig into the process for creating things that we want in our lives and talk about the biggest mistake people make around this process. I also explain how you can make this creation process effortless and ensure you don’t give up until you achieve those things.

Get full show notes and more information here: http://thelifecoachschool.com/102/

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #101: Awareness - Watching Models
episodes.summary:
On this episode, of The Life Coach School, we’re talking about the incredible power of increasing our consciousness by watching models. Join us to learn about the five phases of consciousness and how you can increase it to the level most people will never get to. Discover how you can become an observer and gain a true understanding of why you feel the way that you do and why you’re thinking what you’re thinking.

Get full show notes and more information here: http://thelifecoachschool.com/101

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #100: Best Lessons in My Lifetime
episodes.summary:
Join us as I share the most important lessons I have learned until this day. From the ideas about my relationship with money and work to the epiphanies around thoughts, feelings, goals, and dreams, you’ll discover 25 most influential lessons that have shaped me into the person that I am today.

Get full show notes and more information here: http://thelifecoachschool.com/100

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #99: Acceptance Requires Effort
episodes.summary:
On this episode of The Life Coach Shcool, we take a look at the power of fully accepting our past and our present. We dive into what it really means to accept the things we have no ability to change and the incredible results you can expect in your life once you make this process a daily practice. Join us to discover how using the techniques laid out in this episode, you can create and extraordinary life and achieve anything you put your mind to.

Get full show notes and more information here: http://thelifecoachschool.com/99

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #98: Questions and Answers
episodes.summary:
On this episode of The Life Coach School podcast, we have another questions & answers session where we dive into a wide range of topics from teaching children manners to learning how to break bad habits.

Get full show notes and more information  here: http://thelifecoachschool.com/98

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #97: Balancing Emotion
episodes.summary:
Listen in to discover how you can learn to balance your emotions and how to get better at feeling every emotion, becoming stronger in the process.

Get full show notes and more information here: http://thelifecoachschool.com/97

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: How to Feel Better Announcement

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #96: What Feels Good
episodes.summary:
In this episode, we dive into the reasons why familiarity feels good and why making changes doesn't. Listen in to discover the main factors that determine whether you succeed in reaching your goals and my strategy for feeling good during the process of making positive changes.

Get full show notes and more information here: http://thelifecoachschool.com/96/

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #95: What Prevents Joy
episodes.summary:
On this episode, we explore the true sources of joy and why seeking pleasure outside of ourselves often happens to be at the expense of joy.

Get full show notes and more information here: http://thelifecoachschool.com/95

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #94: How to Practice Thinking
episodes.summary:
On this episode of The Life Coach School, I lay out the process of coming up with new thoughts that will serve you and practicing them on a regular basis until they become a part of you. Turn up the volume and get ready to take notes, as this process will surely help you experience the feelings and achieve the results you want.

Get full show notes and more information here: http://thelifecoachschool.com/94

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #93: Two Types of Emotions
episodes.summary:
On this episode of The Life Coach School podcast, we cover the importance of generating your feelings ahead of time rather than reacting to results that you’re currently experiencing. Joins us to discover how to distinguish between energy-producing and energy-depleting emotions and, depending on the type of a result you’re trying to create in your life, how to generate the right emotion to get the job done.

Get full show notes and more information here: http://thelifecoachschool.com/93

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #92: How to Feel
episodes.summary:
Today, we take a look at why do many of don't know how to feel our feelings and resist them on regular basis. Listen in as we take a deep dive into how to literally experience emotions. You won't want to miss this step-by-step approach to truly feeling your feelings.

Get full show notes and more information here: http://thelifecoachschool.com/92

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #91: Interview with Andrea Hanson
episodes.summary:
Andrea joins us to talk about the struggles people with any kind of serious diagnosis have in their everyday life and share some incredible tips and strategies for managing their mind during those hard times. Listen in to learn about her unique approach to dealing with the stress that comes with having serious conditions like MS and how you can work with her one-on-one if you're or your loved one happens to be that situation.

Get full show notes and more information here: http://thelifecoachschool.com/91

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #90: Learned from Geneen Roth
episodes.summary:
On our 90th episode of The Life Coach School Podcast, you'll hear about Geneen's loving message of kindness to ourselves and experience some of her best quotes and philosophies. Tune in to discover her incredible way of bringing us inside of our bodies to help us understand and pay attention to what’s going on rather than trying to dull it with food and escape it by avoiding it.

Get full show notes and more information here: http://thelifecoachschool.com/90

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #89: Diets
episodes.summary:
Today, we take a deep dive into the idea of diets, why we often make ourselves the victim and a diet the villain, and whether that is useful or helpful for us. Join us as we analyze the common reasons why people fail on diets and what we can do in order to find a diet that will work for us and stick to it.

Get full show notes and more information here: http://thelifecoachschool.com/89

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #88: So What?
episodes.summary:
On this episode, we take a deep dive into the great tool, “So what?” and how it can help you tell yourself the story that will serve you. Don’t miss this opportunity to learn to manage your mind give yourself the biggest gift in your life – choosing your story.

Ge full show notes and more information here: http://thelifecoachschool.com/88

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #87: Discipline
episodes.summary:
On this episode of The Life Coach School, we take a look at the importance of discipline in different aspects of our lives and how by practicing it, we can achieve freedom. Tune in for a healthy dose of motivation as well as some game-changing tips to start building your willpower and achieve the freedom in your life that you deserve.

Get full show notes and more information here: http://thelifecoachschool.com/87

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #86: Do Goals
episodes.summary:
Listen in as I lay out the step-by-step process of setting your Do Goals and explain why these goals are the closest thing to rubbing a genie lamp and making a wish. Click "play" below to find out how you can use this simple process to accomplishing ANYTHING you want in life.

Get full show notes and more information here: http://thelifecoachschool.com/86

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #85: Constraint
episodes.summary:
Joins us as I explain why it’s so important for us to put constraints on most aspects of our lives and the incredible changes you can experience as a result. Listen in to discover how limiting your options can help positively impact your life, improve your self-esteem and make you feel better about yourself.

Get full show notes and more information here: http://thelifecoachschool.com/85/

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Bonus Episode: Bora Bora
episodes.summary: Bonus Episode: Bora Bora

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #84: Showing Up
episodes.summary:
On this episode, we take a look into the importance of truly caring for ourselves in the way that makes us feel like we’re always being our best selves. Tune in as I share my best tips for making ourselves presentable every day and every moment as well as the effects it will have on your life. From figuring out your style to choosing the right shoes to wear, you’ll discover what you can be doing to show up as the best version of yourself, in your life and your business.

Get full show notes and more information here: http://thelifecoachschool.com/84

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #83: Model Mistakes
episodes.summary:
Today, we address the common mistakes people make when applying The Model. Listen in as we review The Model and take a look how to properly apply it to any situation in your life.

Get full show notes and more information here: http://thelifecoachschool.com/83

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #82: What Should I Tolerate?
episodes.summary:
Today, we're talking about an interesting topic that many of our listeners have asked me about on many occasions - what should we tolerate in our lives and why.

Tune in to this episode of The Life Coach School podcast as I answer questions related to boundaries, making your own decisions and tolerating behaviors of other people. You won't want to miss this insightful episode!

Get full show notes and more information here: http://thelifecoachschool.com/82

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #81: When Something Bad Happens
episodes.summary:
When something happens to us that you would label as very “bad,” the most important thing that we must remember that all problems are in our mind. On this episode of The Life Coach School podcast, we take a look at managing our mind during the times of these unfortunate events. Listen in how you can coach yourself through these events and still show up as your best self for yourself, your loved ones, and others around you. 

Get full show notes and more information here: http://thelifecoachschool.com/81

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #80: Lessons from Stephen Cope
episodes.summary:
Listen in to discover some of the most important topics and quotes that Stephen Cope offers in his influential writings. Don’t miss these inspirational and mind-blowing teachings that may forever change your life (like thy did mine) and bring you success and happiness you've been looking for.

Get full show notes and more information here: http://thelifecoachschool.com/80

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #79: Interview with Molly Freestone
episodes.summary:
On this episode, Molly and I discuss a variety of topics related to moms and some of the concepts that she helps them work through in her coaching practice. We cover the reasons why it’s impossible to make your children happy and talk about the biggest gift that you can give them as a parent and much, much more... Don’t miss Molly’s expert tips for healthy parenting as well as taking care of yourself as a mother so you can best serve your children and lead a fulfilled life in the process.

Get full show notes and more information here: http://thelifecoachschool.com/79

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #78: When Someone Hates You
episodes.summary:
Today, we’re taking a deep dive into the instances where someone very strongly dislikes you and what we can and should (or shouldn't) do about it. We get into why we experience pain when others have such strong feelings toward us and how to best handle these situations in a way that best serve us. You don't want to miss this important episode!'

Get full show notes and more information here: http://thelifecoachschool.com/78

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #77: Weight Loss Challenges - Part 2
episodes.summary:
On this episode, we’re talking about understanding your mind, feelings, commitment, patience and kindness, and what needs to change in our thinking to be able to lose weight. Tune in for a juicy sneak peek at some of the concepts from our upcoming "Stop Overeating Masterclass" course. You won't want to miss this episode, jam-packed full of game-changing ideas to help you lose weight and keep it off for life!

Get full show notes and more information here: http://thelifecoachschool.com/77

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #76: Weight Loss Challenges - Part 1
episodes.summary:
Today, we’re kicking off our two-part series about weight loss challenges. In the first part of this exploration, we go over the first five things that challenge us and help us, that can be useful tools that we need to understand when it comes to losing weight.

Get full show notes and more information here: http://thelifecoachschool.com/76

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #75: Toxic People
episodes.summary:
Join us on this episode of The Life Coach School podcast to discover the reasons why certain people get under our skin and what we can do about it. Listen in as we discuss the importance of realizing that everyone is allowed to do whatever they want and that we don’t have any control over them.  Click “play” below and get ready for some eye-opening ideas and advice that is sure to help you with your “Toxic Person” problem!

Get full show notes and more information here: http://thelifecoachschool.com/75

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #74: Indulgent Emotions
episodes.summary:
On this episode of The Life Coach School podcast, we talk about the emotions that feel comfortable to us, that we dive into more than we would like to, but don’t give us the results that we want. Tune in to find out why we so often sabotage ourselves with these emotions and how we can create new, positive emotions that get us to where we want to be in our lives. 

Get full show notes and more information here: http://thelifecoachschool.com/74

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #73: Questions and Answers
episodes.summary:
On this Q & A episode, you’ll hear about topics like how to tell if you’re full when you’re eating, how not to think of yourself as a victim, the effects of self-criticism, when you should decide to quit your job and a few others.

Get full show notes and more information here: http://thelifecoachschool.com/73

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #72: The Self Coaching Model - A Review
episodes.summary:
Recently, I’ve been getting a lot of questions from my students and listeners about different aspects of The Self Coaching Model. So on this episode of The Life Coach School, I decided to do a review of The Model.

Get full show notes and more information here: http://thelifecoachschool.com/72

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #71: Weight Loss and Hunger
episodes.summary:
On this episode of The Life Coach School podcast, we’re taking a look at two aspects of weight loss and hunger - the math (eat less and exercise more) and why we’re not doing what we know is the right thing to do. We explore what’s going on in our bodies when we’re physically hungry and when we’re physically full as well what’s happening in our minds when we want to eat food to satisfy something that has nothing to do with our physical bodies. Listen in as I explain how you can begin your journey to a healthy body and maintain it for the rest of your life.

Get full show notes and more information here: http://thelifecoachschool.com/71

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #70: Lessons Learned from Dan Sullivan
episodes.summary:
Over the course of my life and coaching career, I’ve used many of Dan Sullivan’s tools and have implemented them into so much of the stuff that I do. On this episode, I'm extremely excited to share Dan's concepts with all of you. Listen in for an introduction to his incredible teachings and his life-changing quotes and ideas.

Get full show notes and more information here: http://thelifecoachschool.com/70

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #69: Interview with Karen Anderson
episodes.summary:
Join us as Karen talks about doing her mother issues work on herself and having spectacular results and how she simply had to share that amazing gift with others. Listen in to learn about Karen’s coaching process and how you too can to break out of the spiral of powerlessness and live a full life of freedom and joy!

Get full show notes and more information here:

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #68: Make Yourself Proud
episodes.summary:
Today, we’re talking about making yourself proud. I truly believe that the emotion of pride for yourself is one of the best emotions. As we are growing up, we constantly want our most important people in our lives to be proud of us and yet that’s something that we are able to give to ourselves.

Get full show notes and more information here: http://thelifecoachschool.com/68

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #67: Dealing with Regret
episodes.summary:
A lot of people come to me with many regrets about what they’ve done or haven’t done in the past and the opportunities they have missed. If you’ve been listening to The Life Coach School Podcast for a while, you know that most emotions fall into two categories: useful emotions and indulgent, not useful emotions. So where does regret fall? Is there an upside to regret?

Get full show notes and more information here: http://thelifecoachschool.com/67

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #66: Questions and Answers
episodes.summary:
Today, I pull back the curtain on some of the exciting stuff that happens at our in-person group training that we hold three times a year. Also, from solving problems to dealing with feelings of worthlessness and many other topics, I answer some powerful questions that you’ve sent in recently.

Get full show notes and more information here: http://thelifecoachschool.com/66

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #65: Self-Loathing
episodes.summary:
On this episode of The Life Coach School, we once more take a deep look within ourselves and tackle the topic that many don’t like to talk about - self-loathing.  Listen in for some practical advice and exercises you can start using today to help you find out more about yourself and what makes you truly happy.

Get full show notes and more information here: http://thelifecoachschool.com/65

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #64: Finding and Owning Thoughts
episodes.summary:
On this episode, I analyze the thought process I was experiencing during my anger moment and talk about what I could have done differently to prevent chaos. Listen in for an example of my step-by-step process of doing work on myself, as well as some useful tips for finding and owning our thoughts.

Get full show notes and more information here: http://thelifecoachschool.com/64

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #63: Dreams and Desires
episodes.summary:
On this episode of The Life Coach School, we get into why so many of us don’t dream and set goals. Join me for this important exploration of your mind and find out how you can start honoring your desires over your doubts and become committed to this powerful process. Don't miss this inspirational episode that will surely help you start living the life where you feel most alive!

Get full show notes and more information here: http://thelifecoachschool.com/63

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #62: Interview with Suyin Nichols
episodes.summary:
Suyin joins us to talk about her unique approach to weight loss and how she takes people through the process of “loving themselves lighter.” Join us for our discussion about what food means to us and why, and what we can do to change our mentality and our relationship with food in a way that serves us.

Get full show notes and more information here: http://thelifecoachschool.com/62

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #61: Questions and Answers
episodes.summary:
It is time for another Q & A episode, where I answer any of your questions that you submitted previously! Listen in as we dig into some of the topics that you, our loyal listeners, have asked to hear about...

Get full show notes and more information here: http://thelifecoachschool.com/61

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #60: Lessons from Abraham
episodes.summary:
Listen in to learn about some of the most important ideas and quotes that came from Abraham. You don’t want to miss these inspirational teaching that may forever change the way you view the world and bring you success and happiness that you deserve!

Get full show notes and more information here: http://thelifecoachschool.com/60

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #59: Ease vs. Evolving
episodes.summary:
On this episode of The Life Coach School, we’re digging into what it really means for us to evolve to the next stage of our lives. Tune in to learn why this change should not feel easy and what obstacles you can expect on this journey of evolution.  Join us for important insights and actionable tips that will help you prepare for this challenging and highly rewarding feat.

Get full show notes and more information here: http://thelifecoachschool.com/59

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #58: Self-Confidence
episodes.summary:
Self-confidence is one of those things that ultimately determines whether you’re going to be highly successful in your life or not. When you look at people who have genuine self-confidence, you just know that they either have created or are about to create something amazing. So how does it work and how do we gain that unshakable confidence in ourselves?

Get full show notes and more information here: http://thelifecoachschool.com/58

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #57: Interview with Kelly McCormick
episodes.summary:
I invited Kelly to talk about anxiety and how it applies to us in our daily lives. We discuss why we feel anxiety, how to best deal with it and how we can take advantage of it. Kelly also shares the details of her coaching process and the benefits her clients walk away with when they complete her coaching course. Don’t miss Kelly’s expert tips that are sure to help you tackle your anxiety issues and find out more about yourself and who you truly are!

Get full show notes and more information here: http://thelifecoachschool.com/57

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #56: Questions and Answers
episodes.summary:
On this Q & A episode we cover an array of important topics ranging from making decisions about taking action, boundaries and thought management, to the level of proficiency you need to have in certain areas of your life in order to be able to coach others.  Don’t miss this value-packed episode of listener questions and answers!

Get full show notes and more information here: http://thelifecoachschool.com/56

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #55: Drama
episodes.summary:
Today, we analyze our mind drama and what it does to us when we try to reach our goals, earn more money or get certain things accomplished. I explain how that drama prevents us from accessing our true abundance in our lives and what we can do in order to remove this useless obstacle from our everyday thinking.

Get full show notes and more information here: http://thelifecoachschool.com/55

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #54: Useful Emotions
episodes.summary:
In this episode of Life Coach School we delve into the topic of useful emotions, what they are and how they work. We also talk about the flipside – the indulgent emotions and how they either harm us or simply don’t do anything for us. Tune in to hear about all the intricacies of this life-changing concept and how it can help you in your life.

Get full show notes and more information here: http://thelifecoachschool.com/54

episodes.seriesTitle: The Life Coach School Podcast with Brooke Castillo
episodes.title: Ep #53: Ambition
episodes.summary:
On this episode of the Life Coach School podcast, we dissect the meaning of the word “Ambition” to help you figure out if you should aspire to be ambitious and get inspired by those types of people. Listen in to find out what you can do to cultivate ambition within you, and do it for the right reasons. Check it out below...

Get full show notes and more information here: http://thelifecoachschool.com/53

A lot of you have been asking to hear more about me and about my story, so here it is… This episode is for you. Today, we’re doing something a bit different. One of my master coaches and colleagues, a dear friend Lin Eleoff, interviews me about my life and business.
